oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carnival Poster Receipt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Greene, Colton; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt: Payment of $30 to: John H. Miller for organizing the distribution of carnival posters "throughout the territory contiguous to Memphis and the U.S. and Europe; authorized by General Colton Greene, director."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
